title: Project Setup & Infrastructure
description: Initialize project structure, Docker configuration, and development environment

title: Create backend directory structure
description: Set up backend/ folder with api/, core/, models/, services/ subdirectories per design doc

title: Create frontend directory structure
description: Set up frontend/ folder with src/components/, hooks/, services/ per design doc

title: Create Docker Compose configuration
description: Configure docker-compose.yml with backend, redis, frontend services

title: Create environment configuration
description: Create .env.example with all environment variables per design doc

title: Create AI model startup scripts
description: Create ai/start_detector.sh and ai/start_llm.sh for native GPU processes

title: Create backend requirements.txt
description: Define Python dependencies: fastapi, uvicorn, sqlalchemy, redis, watchdog, pillow, pynvml

title: Create frontend package.json
description: Define React/TypeScript dependencies: react, typescript, tailwindcss, tremor, headless-ui, lucide-react

title: Configure Tailwind with NVIDIA theme
description: Set up tailwind.config.js with NVIDIA color palette: #76B900 green, #0E0E0E background, risk colors

title: AI Pipeline - RT-DETRv2 & Nemotron
description: Implement file watcher, RT-DETRv2 detection service, batch aggregator, and Nemotron analysis integration

title: Implement file watcher service
description: Create services/file_watcher.py using watchdog to monitor /export/foscam/{camera}/ for new images/videos with 500ms debounce

title: Write tests for file watcher service
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for file watcher detecting new uploads

title: Write tests for detector client
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for RT-DETRv2 client with mocked responses

title: Write tests for batch aggregator
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for Redis-based batch aggregation logic

title: Write tests for Nemotron analyzer
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for LLM analyzer with mocked responses

title: Implement RT-DETRv2 inference wrapper
description: Create ai/rtdetr/model.py HTTP server wrapping RT-DETRv2 inference on port 8001

title: Implement detector client service
description: Create services/detector.py to call RT-DETRv2 service, extract bounding boxes, save thumbnails

title: Implement batch aggregator service
description: Create services/batch_aggregator.py using Redis to group detections by camera with 90s window and 30s idle timeout

title: Implement Nemotron analyzer service
description: Create services/analyzer.py to call llama.cpp server on port 8002 with risk assessment prompt template

title: Implement Nemotron prompt template
description: Create prompt template for risk assessment with JSON output schema per design doc

title: Configure llama.cpp server for Nemotron
description: Create ai/nemotron/config.json with Q4_K_M quantization, 2048 context, 35 GPU layers

title: Implement thumbnail generation with bounding boxes
description: Add bounding box overlay drawing to detection thumbnails using Pillow

title: Create model download script
description: Create scripts/download_models.sh to fetch RT-DETRv2 weights and Nemotron GGUF

title: Backend Core - FastAPI & Database
description: Implement FastAPI backend with SQLite database, Redis integration, and REST/WebSocket APIs

title: Implement SQLite database models
description: Create SQLAlchemy models for cameras, detections, events, gpu_stats tables per schema

title: Implement WebSocket system channel
description: Create WS /ws/system for gpu_stats and camera_status updates

title: Implement GPU monitor service
description: Create services/gpu_monitor.py using pynvml to poll GPU stats every 2s

title: Implement data cleanup service
description: Create services/cleanup.py for 30-day retention policy enforcement

title: Write tests for database models
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for Camera, Detection, Event, GpuStats models before implementation

title: Write tests for cameras API
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for /api/cameras CRUD endpoints

title: Write tests for system API
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for /api/system endpoints (health, config, gpu)

title: Write tests for events API
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for /api/events endpoints

title: Write tests for detections API
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for /api/detections endpoints

title: Write tests for WebSocket channels
description: TDD: Write pytest tests for WebSocket event/system broadcasts

title: Implement database connection and migrations
description: Set up SQLite connection in core/database.py with table creation

title: Implement Redis connection
description: Set up Redis client in core/redis.py for queues and pub/sub

title: Implement cameras API endpoints
description: Create GET/POST/PATCH/DELETE /api/cameras endpoints

title: Implement events API endpoints
description: Create GET /api/events with pagination, filtering; PATCH for mark reviewed

title: Implement detections API endpoints
description: Create GET /api/detections and /api/detections/{id}/image for bbox overlay

title: Implement system API endpoints
description: Create GET /api/system/gpu, /health, /config endpoints

title: Implement media serving endpoint
description: Create GET /api/media/{path} to serve images/videos from storage

title: Implement WebSocket event channel
description: Create WS /ws/events for new_event and detection broadcasts

title: Implement basic API Key authentication middleware
Logging System
description: Comprehensive logging system for development debugging, production monitoring, and audit trail. Includes unified backend logger, SQLite storage, frontend event capture, and admin UI.

title: Add logging configuration to Settings
description: Add logging environment variables to backend/core/config.py: LOG_LEVEL, LOG_FILE_PATH, LOG_FILE_MAX_BYTES, LOG_FILE_BACKUP_COUNT, LOG_DB_ENABLED, LOG_DB_MIN_LEVEL, LOG_RETENTION_DAYS

title: Write logs API integration tests
description: Create backend/tests/integration/test_logs_api.py: test all endpoints, filtering, pagination, frontend log submission, rate limiting.

title: Create frontend logger service
description: Create frontend/src/services/logger.ts: logger.error(), logger.event(), window.onerror handler, React error boundary integration, batched submission to backend (5s or 10 items).

title: Create LogStatsCards component
description: Create frontend/src/components/logs/LogStatsCards.tsx: display error count (red if >0), warnings, total today, most active component. Match GpuStats styling.

title: Create LogFilters component
description: Create frontend/src/components/logs/LogFilters.tsx: filter by level, component, camera, date range, search text. Match EventTimeline filter panel styling.

title: Create LogsTable component
description: Create frontend/src/components/logs/LogsTable.tsx: paginated table with timestamp, level (colored badge), component, message. Click row to open detail modal. Match EventTimeline pagination pattern.

title: Create LogDetailModal component
description: Create frontend/src/components/logs/LogDetailModal.tsx: show full log entry with formatted extra JSON data. Match EventDetailModal styling.

title: Create LogsDashboard page
description: Create frontend/src/components/logs/LogsDashboard.tsx: main page assembling LogStatsCards, LogFilters, LogsTable. Fetch data from /api/logs and /api/logs/stats endpoints.

title: Add Logs navigation and routing
description: Add 'Logs' tab to navigation. Add /logs route to App.tsx routing. Add fetchLogs() and fetchLogStats() to api.ts service.

title: Write frontend logs component tests
description: Write tests for all logs components: LogsDashboard, LogStatsCards, LogsTable, LogFilters, LogDetailModal. Test rendering, filter interactions, API mocking.

title: Enhance existing services with structured logging
description: Update existing services (file_watcher, detector_client, nemotron_analyzer, batch_aggregator, etc.) to use get_logger() and add structured context fields (camera_id, event_id, duration_ms).

title: Create unified logger module
description: Create backend/core/logging.py with setup_logging(), get_logger(), StreamHandler, RotatingFileHandler, and custom SQLiteHandler. Include context injection via logging.Filter for request_id.

title: End-to-end logging verification
description: Verify complete logging flow: backend logs appear in console, files, and database. Frontend events captured. Admin UI displays and filters logs correctly.

title: Create Log SQLAlchemy model
description: Create backend/models/log.py with Log model: id, timestamp, level, component, message, camera_id, event_id, request_id, detection_id, duration_ms, extra (JSON), source, user_agent. Add indexes for timestamp, level, component, camera_id.

title: Create logs API schemas
description: Create backend/api/schemas/logs.py with Pydantic models: LogEntry, LogsResponse (paginated), LogStats (dashboard summary), FrontendLogCreate (validation for frontend submissions).

title: Create logs API routes
description: Create backend/api/routes/logs.py with endpoints: GET /api/logs (paginated, filtered), GET /api/logs/stats (dashboard summary), GET /api/logs/{id} (detail), POST /api/logs/frontend (receive frontend logs with rate limiting).

title: Add request_id middleware
description: Add FastAPI middleware to generate and inject request_id into all logs during request lifecycle. Use contextvars for thread-safe context passing.

title: Initialize logging in main.py
description: Call setup_logging() before FastAPI app creation in backend/main.py. Register logs router.

title: Add log retention to cleanup service
description: Extend backend/services/cleanup_service.py to delete logs older than LOG_RETENTION_DAYS. Run vacuum after cleanup.

title: Write backend logging unit tests
description: Create backend/tests/unit/test_logging.py: test logger setup, handlers, formatters, context injection, SQLite handler writes.

title: Integration & E2E Testing
description: End-to-end integration testing, Docker deployment verification, and system documentation

title: Create backend unit tests
description: Write pytest tests for API endpoints, database operations, and service functions

title: Create frontend component tests
description: Write Vitest/React Testing Library tests for key components

title: Create E2E pipeline integration test
description: Test full flow: file upload -> detection -> batch -> Nemotron -> event stored -> WebSocket broadcast

title: Test Docker Compose deployment
description: Verify docker-compose up starts all services correctly and they can communicate

title: Test native AI model startup
description: Verify RT-DETRv2 and llama.cpp servers start and respond to health checks

title: Create seed cameras script
description: Create scripts/seed_cameras.py to populate initial camera configuration from /export/foscam/

title: Create project README
description: Write README.md with setup instructions, architecture overview, and usage guide

title: Create setup script
description: Create scripts/setup.sh for initial environment setup and dependency installation

title: Write tests for Fast Path alerts

title: Implement Settings page - Cameras tab

title: Implement Settings page - Processing tab

title: Implement Settings page - AI Models tab

title: Implement RiskBadge component
description: Create common/RiskBadge.tsx with LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH color-coded badges

title: Write tests for RiskBadge component

title: Write tests for API client
description: TDD: Write Vitest tests for API client service with mocked fetch

title: Write tests for Dashboard components
description: TDD: Write Vitest tests for RiskGauge, ActivityFeed, CameraGrid, GpuStats

title: Implement API client service
description: Create services/api.ts with typed fetch wrappers for all REST endpoints

title: Write tests for EventCard component
description: TDD: Write Vitest tests for EventCard rendering with various risk levels

title: Implement WebSocket hooks
description: Create hooks/useWebSocket.ts for real-time event and system updates

title: Implement circular Risk Gauge component
description: Create dashboard/RiskGauge.tsx with SVG circular gauge, 0-100 scale, color coding, sparkline

title: Implement Live Activity Feed component
description: Create dashboard/ActivityFeed.tsx with scrolling event cards, risk badges, AI summaries

title: Implement Camera Grid component
description: Create dashboard/CameraGrid.tsx with 2x4 grid of camera thumbnails and status indicators

title: Implement GPU Stats component
description: Create dashboard/GpuStats.tsx with Tremor charts for utilization, temp, memory, FPS

title: Implement main Dashboard page
description: Compose Dashboard page with RiskGauge, ActivityFeed, CameraGrid, GpuStats panels

title: Implement Event Timeline page
description: Create Timeline page with filter bar, event list, pagination, risk summary badges
